Have you ever accidentally deleted important files or formatted your USB drive without backup? Data loss can be a stressful experience, but don't worry because there is a solution. Recuva is a free data recovery software used to recover lost, accidentally deleted files from Windows computers, USB drives, and memory cards.

## Features

### File Recovery

Recuva can recover files of all types, including photos, videos, documents, and emails. It can also recover files from damaged or formatted disks. You can run a quick scan to search for recently deleted files or perform a deep scan to recover files from damaged or inaccessible drives.

### Portable Version

Recuva has a portable version that you can save on your USB drive. This version allows you to recover files from any computer without installation. 

### User-Friendly Interface

Recuva has a simple and user-friendly interface that makes the recovery process easier. You can choose the type of file you want to recover or the disk you want to scan. The software also allows you to preview files before recovery.

## How to Use Recuva

1. Download and install Recuva from the official website.
2. Launch the software and choose the type of file you want to recover or the disk you want to scan.
3. Start the scanning process and wait for the software to search for deleted files.
4. Preview and select the files you want to recover.
5. Choose the location where you want to save the recovered files.

## Conclusion

Recuva is a powerful data recovery software that can save you from data loss disasters. Its user-friendly interface and a wide range of features make it a popular choice among users. With Recuva, you can recover lost files on your own without seeking professional help.
